Course overview

Readings:
Martin Luther King Day (no class)
  • Suggested: My Name Is Pauli Murray (2021), directed by Julie Cohen & Betsy West, 91 min

Love at the drinking party I
  • Plato, Symposium, up to 194e (just before the start of Agathon’s speech)

Love at the drinking party II
  • Plato, Symposium, 195a–212c (till the end of Socrates’ speech)

Love at the drinking party III
  • Plato, Symposium, 212c to the end

“Happy ever after”?
  • Carrie Jenkins, Sad Love: Romance and the Search for Meaning (2022), chap. 2

Love under patriarchy
  • Simone de Beauvoir, The Second Sex (1949), pp. 683–708, 432–36, 420–22 (in this order)
Due Dates: If you are honors student who would like to complete an honors contract with me, please meet with me by this day

FemPhilAZ 2025 (Day 2)
